meanings.definition: The state of being full of danger or risk.
meanings.sent1: The perilousnesses of the dark forest made the travelers nervous.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the abandoned mine was a journey through perilousnesses.
meanings.sent3: The perilousnesses of the roller coaster ride left everyone screaming with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The perilousnesses of the stormy sea mirrored the uncertainty of life.
meanings.sent5: The perilousnesses of the situation were evident in the trembling hands of the hiker.

meanings.definition: The quality of being hazardous or unsafe.
meanings.sent1: The workers were trained to handle the perilousnesses of the job site.
meanings.sent2: The perilousnesses of the chemicals required special safety measures.
meanings.sent3: Despite the perilousnesses of the situation, they managed to stay calm.
meanings.sent4: The perilousnesses of the icy road made driving treacherous.
meanings.sent5: The perilousnesses of the mountain path demanded caution and attention.
